sentences.sContent: Staff use the poison to exterminate moles and rabbits.
sentences.sCn: 员工用毒药来消灭鼹鼠和野兔。

remMethod.val: ex + termin(范围； 结束) + ate → 从范围中消除 → 消灭

words.tran: 根除者；（美）灭鼠药；（美）职业的消灭害虫者

trans.tranOther: to kill large numbers of people or animals of a particular type so that they no longer exist
